statements: SELECT * FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT investment_strategy, risk_tolerance FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE investment_horizon > 5;
SELECT * FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' AND investment_horizon < 10;
SELECT client_id, preferred_sectors FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE investment_strategy = 'Conservative';
SELECT client_id, investment_strategy, risk_tolerance, investment_horizon, preferred_sectors FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT client_id, risk_tolerance, investment_strategy FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE investment_horizon > 5;
SELECT * FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high' AND preferred_sectors LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT client_id, investment_horizon FROM client_investment_preferences WHERE investment_horizon BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT client_id, risk_tolerance, investment_strategy FROM client_investment_preferences ORDER BY investment_horizon DESC, risk_tolerance ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientProfiles;
SELECT client_name, investment_preferences FROM ClientProfiles;
SELECT * FROM CustomizedReports WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT report_type, report_date FROM CustomizedReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, report_type, report_date FROM ClientProfiles INNER JOIN CustomizedReports ON ClientProfiles.client_id = CustomizedReports.client_id;
SELECT * FROM ClientProfiles;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM ClientProfiles WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, investment_preferences FROM ClientProfiles ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_preferences FROM ClientProfiles WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, client_id, report_type, report_date, report_details FROM CustomizedReports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT report_title, report_date, report_details FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM clients JOIN investments ON clients.client_id = investments.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM clients c, investments i WHERE c.client_id = i.investment_id;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(investment_amount) AS max_investment_amount FROM investments;
SELECT client_name, investment_name, report_title FROM clients c, investments i, reports r WHERE c.client_id = r.client_id AND c.client_id = 2 AND i.investment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ClientPreferences;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type FROM Investments WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, report_content FROM ClientReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM ReportTemplates WHERE template_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT client_id, investment_amount FROM Investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance='Medium'
SELECT client_id, investment_style FROM ClientPreferences ORDER BY investment_horizon DESC
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000 AND client_id = 1234
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM ClientReports WHERE client_id = 5678 AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT template_name FROM ReportTemplates WHERE template_content LIKE '%summary%'
SELECT * FROM ClientPreferences;
SELECT client_id, investment_horizon, investment_strategy FROM ClientPreferences ORDER BY investment_horizon DESC;
SELECT report_id, client_id, report_content FROM CustomizedReports WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT portfolio_id, asset_class, quantity, price FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 500;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM InvestmentStrategy ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientPreferences WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, risk_tolerance, investment_horizon FROM ClientPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Medium';
SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT portfolio_id, asset_class, quantity, price FROM InvestmentPortfolio ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT client_id, report_date, report_content FROM CustomizedReports WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
